title: Internet is fine and connection lost!
body: Some times when i in the loading screen it shows up connection lost and the internet was fine i can go on youtube and everyting, and reconnect shows the same thing even i log off and login again still same I have to restart my lol to login and start game and i always get report like that how can i fix it ???!!!!!

replies.body:
So, what exactly is happening? You weren't being very clear.

Could you provide your OS and ISP?
